alert.note: Alert for Highland; Pike; Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 04 at 1:58PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN PIKE, SOUTHEASTERN HIGHLAND AND SOUTHWESTERN ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 245 PM EDT... At 158 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Belfast, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail and frequent cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Lightning can cause serious injury or death. Locations impacted include... Hillsboro, Marshall, Bainbridge, Pike Lake, Kincaid Springs, Rocky Fork Point, Cynthiana, Highland Holiday, South Salem, Rocky Fork Lake, Bourneville, Rainsboro, Lattaville, Buchanan, Paint Creek State Park, Summithill, Knockemstiff, Berrysville and Highland County Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. When thunder roars, go indoors! Do not stay in the open or seek shelter under trees when lightning threatens. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
